text.name: input_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_ONOFF
text.text: EV: Blocage de la direction actuelle

text.name: input_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_TRACK_1
text.text: EV: Increase amount of turnover tracks

text.name: input_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_TRACK_2
text.text: EV: Decrease amount of turnover tracks

text.name: input_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_TRACKP_1
text.text: EV: Move tracks to the right

text.name: input_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_TRACKP_2
text.text: EV: Move tracks to the left

text.name: input_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_TRACKO_1
text.text: EV: Move offset line to the right

text.name: input_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_TRACKO_2
text.text: EV: Move offset line to the left

text.name: input_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_TRACKJ_1
text.text: EV: Move vehicle one track to the right (no turn)

text.name: input_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_TRACKJ_2
text.text: EV: Move vehicle one track to the left (no turn)

text.name: input_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_HL_DIST_1
text.text: EV: Increase headland distance to end of field

text.name: input_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_SNAP_HL_DIST_2
text.text: EV: Decrease headland distance to end of field

text.name: input_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_MENU
text.text: EV: ouvrir le menu de configuration

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_sectionSnapSettings
text.text: Réglages de l'assistant de conduite en ligne

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_resetConfigButton
text.text: Réinitialisation de la configuration du Mod

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_resetConfigTT
text.text: ATTENTION: Réinitialisation des valeurs par défaut

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_reloadConfigButton
text.text: Rechargement de la configuration du Mod (XML)

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_reloadConfigTT
text.text: Rechargement du fichier de configuration depuis le disque. Necessaire après changement manuel du fichier XML.

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_snapTT
text.text: Assistant de conduite en ligne on/off

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_parkingBrakeTT
text.text: Turn on/off global parking brake functionality

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_HUDdiffTT
text.text: Turn on/off Affichage du Blocage de differentiel sur le HUD

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_HUDdmgTT
text.text: Turn on/off Affichage de l'usure sur le HUD

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_HUDfuelTT
text.text: Turn on/off Affichage du Gazoil sur le HUD

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_HUDtrackTitle
text.text: HUD: Assistant de conduite en ligne

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_HUDtrackTT
text.text: Turn on/off Affichage de l'Assistant de conduite en ligne sur le HUD

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_HUDrpmTT
text.text: Turn on/off Affichage des RPM sur le HUD

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_HUDtempTT
text.text: Turn on/off Affichage de la Temperature moteur sur le HUD

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_HUDmiscTT
text.text: Turn on/off Affichage des Valeurs diverses sur le HUD (ex Masse)

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_HUDparkTT
text.text: Turn on/off the HUD display for the parking brake

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_HUDdmgAmountLeftTT
text.text: Affichage de l'état en '% santée' plutot que '% usure'

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_HUDdmgfuelTitle
text.text: HUD: Position of damage and fuel display

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_HUDdmgfuelTT
text.text: FS19: classic above speedmeter; FS22: top-right below gameinfo panel

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_snapSettingsAngleTT
text.text: Pas de réglagle du Blocage de direction (1°-90°)

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_visibleTracksTT
text.text: How many tracks are shown in total (left + right of vehicle)

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_hideLinesTT
text.text: Specifies whether to automatically hide auxiliary and track lines

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_hideLinesAfterTT
text.text: After how many seconds the auxiliary and track lines will be automatically hidden

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_headlandModeTT
text.text: What should happen if headland is reached

text.name: ui_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_headlandDistanceTT
text.text: Turn around how many meters before end of field

text.name: global_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_snapNoImplement
text.text: Did not find a device with a working width.

text.name: global_FS22_EnhancedVehicle_snapNoImplement2
text.text: Did not find a device with a working width. Press again to create a default track layout.
